name: OutSystems Generator MCP Server
description: MCP server providing tools to create and deploy OutSystems applications from natural language prompts. Supports real-time streaming progress updates and production-ready deployment on Cloudflare Workers.

tools.name: createOutSystemsApp
tools.description: Creates and deploys a complete OutSystems application from a text prompt. The prompt should describe the desired application in 10-500 characters.

prompt.description: A detailed description of the application to create. Must be between 10-500 characters.

url.description: The URL where the deployed application can be accessed

applicationKey.description: The unique identifier for the created application

tools.name: healthCheck
tools.description: Checks if the OutSystems API is accessible and authentication is working properly
